original_text: But though we had already suffered and been shamefully treated at Philippi, as you know, we had boldness in our God to declare to you the gospel of God in the midst of much conflict.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 우리가 먼저 빌립보에서 고난과 능욕을 당하였으나 우리 하나님을 힘입어 많은 싸움 중에 하나님의 복음을 너희에게 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: But though we had already suffered
and been shamefully treated at Philippi,
we had boldness in our God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 우리 하나님 안에서 담대함을 가지고

sentences.original_text: to declare to you the gospel of God
in the midst of much conflict.
